===================== 
         File: py-heymodule-1.1-ppc.zip, py-heymodule-1.1-ppc.pkg
       Author: Chris Herborth (chrish@qnx.com)
      Release: 1.1
Compatibility: R4b4 PowerPC (might work with R3.x too)
     Location: /pub/contrib/lang
  Description: BeOS Application Scripting support for Python
        Notes: heymodule adds BeOS application scripting support
               to Python.  No more scripting from C++ or the shell!

               Be sure to read the heymodule.html documentation!

               This requires Python 1.5.1; if you don't already have
               Python installed, download python+heymodule-ppc.zip or
               python+heymodule-ppc.pkg and install it first.

               NOTE: The big archives haven't been updated; they still
                     have heymodule 1.0 inside!

 Installation: If you downloaded py-heymodule-ppc.zip:

                    Unpack the ZIP archive in /boot:

                    unzip -o py-heymodule-ppc.zip -d /boot

               If you downloaded py-heymodule-ppc.pkg:

                    Install py-heymodule-ppc.pkg using Software Valet.
=====================
